documentation.text:
@notice basic implementation of the Staking Mechanism for Niko Token
 @author Thal Marcelin

@dev initializes a new Staking Rewards instance
 @param _tokenAddress     initial supply of NKO

@notice a method to get the total user stked token
 @return uint256 the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.

@dev a method for a stakeholder to create a stake.
 @param _stake The size of the stake to be created.

@notice  to add a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder The stakeholder to add.

@notice to remove a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder the stakeholder to remove.

@notice basic implementation of the Staking Mechanism for Niko Token
 @author Thal Marcelin

@dev initializes a new Staking Rewards instance
 @param _tokenAddress     initial supply of NKO

@notice a method to get the total user stked token
 @return uint256 the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.

@dev a method for a stakeholder to create a stake.
 @param _stake The size of the stake to be created.

@notice  to add a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder The stakeholder to add.

@notice to remove a stakeholder.
 @param _stakeHolder the stakeholder to remove.

constructor.details: initializes a new Staking Rewards instance

createStake(uint256).details: a method for a stakeholder to create a stake.

params._stake: The size of the stake to be created.

getStakes(address).details: retrieve the stake for a stakeholder.

params.stakeHolder: The stakeholder to retrieve the stake for.

returns._0: uint256 the amount of Niko staked.
uint256 the aggregated stakes from all stakeholders.
bool, uint256 whether the address is a stakeholder, and if yes its position in the stakeholders array.

getTotalStakes().notice: a method to get the total user stked token

isStakeHolder(address).notice: function to check if an address is already a stakeholder
